Frame-Server basic implementation example

This is a basic example of a Frame-Server implementation. This page, consisting of index.html, css and image files, is loaded thanks to the default configuration of the static file handler.

The configuration of the static file handler can be defined in the property serveStaticFiles of the server configuration object

Available Links

You can test this example server implementation by applying the following urls:

  • Cookies: /cookies
  • Session: /session
  • Url encoded data post: /form/urlencoded
  • Multipart/form data post: /form/multipart
  • JSON data post: /form/json
  • Middlewares and views: the above data post tests use site middlewares and pug views :)
  • Dedicated file served for dynamic links: file 1: /dyn1, /dyn2; file 2: /d1, /d2
  • Wrong request: just enter any invalid url ;)
